DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine exposure light morning positive influence self-chosen exercise intensity bicycle ergometer overweight obese patient .
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index 25 35 kg/m2 Women pregnant breast feeding , Other clinically significant concomitant disease state ( e.g. , renal failure , hepatic dysfunction , cardiovascular disease , etc . ) , Inability follow procedure study , e.g . due language problem , psychological disorder , dementia , etc . participant Previous enrolment current study Participation study last four week Systolic blood pressure > 170 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg Shift work last two month Travels across time zone last four week Use photosensitisation drug Clinical manifest depression Cardiovascular diseases reduce ageappropriate exercise capacity
